column5: I was just wondering if any one could give me general idea of how the ice conditions are in the Huntsville area.  Thanks

my buddy was just up their he claims theirs about 1 foot on the lake he was fishing. so im assuming most lakes are nice and thick. but always check yourself those small deep rocky lakes can make some weird ice sometimes. i was up on kenesis lake last year in the middle of february and their was only like 6-7" it was freakin weird!!
